statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.SchemaName , AA.DatabaseID , BB.DatabaseName , AA.Description FROM dbo.ADSchema AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.ADDatabase BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.DatabaseID = BB.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.SchemaName LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%'
ORDER BY ROW_NO
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.ADSchema ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, SchemaName, DatabaseID, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #SchemaName#, #DatabaseID#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.ADSchema SET UpdateDate = #UpdateDate# , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName= #UpdateByName#
, SchemaName = #SchemaName# , DatabaseID = #DatabaseID# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
